user.title: Quick Timer
user.description: This integration allows you to schedule one-time actions for any entity with a countdown timer. Click submit to install.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance of Quick Timer is allowed.

init.title: Quick Timer Settings
init.description: Configure time presets shown in the timer card. Enter comma-separated values.

run_action.name: Run Action
run_action.description: Schedule a one-time action with a countdown timer.

task_id.name: Task ID
task_id.description: Unique identifier for this timer task.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The entity to perform the action on (legacy).

task_label.name: Task Label
task_label.description: A human-readable label for this timer task.

finish_actions.name: Finish Actions
finish_actions.description: List of actions to execute when the timer ends.

start_actions.name: Start Actions
start_actions.description: List of actions to execute immediately when the timer starts.

delay.name: Delay
delay.description: The delay before the action is executed.

unit.name: Unit
unit.description: Time unit for the delay (seconds, minutes, hours).

time_mode.name: Time Mode
time_mode.description: Whether to use relative delay or absolute time.

at_time.name: At Time
at_time.description: Absolute time in HH:MM format (when time_mode is absolute).

notify_mobile.name: Mobile Notification
notify_mobile.description: Send a mobile push notification to all devices.

notify_devices.name: Notify Devices
notify_devices.description: Specific mobile devices to send push notifications to.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The entity to cancel the scheduled action for (legacy).

get_preferences.name: Get Preferences
get_preferences.description: Get saved preferences for an entity.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The entity to get preferences for.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The entity to set preferences for.
